name: Defining an onboarding experience
description:
First impressions matter.


Our onboarding experiences are the first impression a user has of our products/features. Perhaps more so than any other, these are make-or-break moments.


This tool is aimed at UX designers, service designers, product designers or others who want to define an onboarding experience.


The tool consists of tasks to be conducted in Figma as part of a workshop setting with stakeholders.
